#summary Changelog of all releases made under version 2.2

==== Version 2.2.0-RC2 (in process) ====

  * [http://code.google.com/p/gnizr/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4]: Unable to delete tags when editing a given RSS subscription (fixed, need testing)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gnizr/issues/detail?id=11 Issue 11]: No error is reported when change password to empty strings (fixed, need testing)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gnizr/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 12]: User 'gnizr' can create new user whose username is an empty string (fixed, need testing)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/gnizr/issues/detail?id=13 Issue 13]: Bookmarks tagged '/' don't show up in the user home page (fixed, need testing)
